title: 3D Tilt Card
notes: Carte qui bascule en 3D au survol
html:
3D Tilt

Survole pour pencher la carte.
js: const card=this.shadowRoot.querySelector('.tilt-card');if(card){card.addEventListener('mousemove',function(e){const r=card.getBoundingClientRect();const x=(e.clientX-r.left)/r.width-0.5;const y=(e.clientY-r.top)/r.height-0.5;card.style.transform='perspective(600px) rotateX('+(-y*10)+'deg) rotateY('+(x*12)+'deg)';});card.addEventListener('mouseleave',function(){card.style.transform='perspective(600px) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg)';});}
